Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.network.socket.ClientHandler

public class ClientHandler extends Object implements VirtualView
Classes which handles Client requests for Socket connection

      Throws:

      ClassNotFoundException - ClassNotFoundException if a class of a serialized object cannot be found.
